i18n.longDescription:
Suffering from battle deficiency? The Battlefield Bundle is just the thing. Revel in the glory of all-out war in Battlefield 4 and immerse yourself in epic cops-vs.-criminals action with Battlefield Hardline. Whether you’re a seasoned fan or new to the Battlefield franchise, this bundle of games offers adrenaline-pumping action and immersive stories.

Bundle Includes:

Battlefield Hardline. Jump into the fastest Battlefield ever in a dramatic cops-vs.-criminals experience where you can play as both sides of the law. Follow Detective Nick Mendoza on his journey to fight police corruption in the single-player campaign or face off with as many as 64 players in a slew of awesome multiplayer modes inspired by TV crime drama.

Battlefield 4. Experience for yourself the chaos and destruction that keeps Battlefield fans coming back for more. Play as Sgt. Daniel Recker in an intense, action-packed single-player campaign. In the mood for company? Take the fight online in multiplayer battles with up to 64 players in an interactive environment that lets you trigger massive destructive events that completely change the map. Only in Battlefield will you blow the foundations of a dam or reduce an entire skyscraper to rubble, or lead a naval assault from the back of a gun boat.

i18n.systemRequirements:
Battlefield 4™

Minimum System Requirements
• OS: Windows Vista SP2 32-bit
• Processor (AMD): Athlon X2 2.8 GHz
• Processor (Intel): Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
• Memory: 4 GB
• Hard Drive: 30 GB
• Graphics card (AMD): AMD Radeon HD 3870
• Graphics card (NVIDIA): NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT
• Graphics memory: 512 MB

Recommended System Requirements
• OS: Windows 8 64-bit
• Processor (AMD): Six-core CPU
• Processor (Intel): Quad-core CPU
• Memory: 8 GB
• Hard Drive: 30 GB
• Graphics card (AMD): AMD Radeon HD 7870
• Graphics card (NVIDIA): NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
• Graphics memory: 3 GB

Battlefield™ Hardline

Minimum System Requirements
• OS: Windows Vista SP2 64-bit (with KB971512 update)
• Processor: Athlon II/Phenom II 2.8 GHz, Intel Core I3/I5 2.4GHz
• Memory: 4 GB
• Graphics Card: ATI 5770 with 1GB VRAM or better/NVIDIA GTX260 with 896MB VRAM or better
• Hard Drive: 60 GB
• DirectX: 11.0

Recommended System Requirements
• OS: Windows 8 64-bit (with KB971512 update)
• Processor: Intel Quad-Core CPU, AMD Six-Core CPU
• Memory: 8 GB RAM
• Graphics Card: AMD 290, NVIDIA GTX760
• Graphics Memory: 3 GB
• Hard Drive: 60 GB
• DirectX: 11.0
